column2: Move forward one of your Pawn for card's value cells (12 for the QUEEN)
Take your selected outboard Pawn on the board OR move forward one of your onboard Pawn for card's value cells (13 for the KING)
Move forward one of the opponents Pawn for card's value cells
Move backward one of your Pawn for card's value cells
Exchange the position of one of your onboard Pawn with any another inboard Pawn
Move forward one of your Pawn for card's value cells and wipe every Pawn encoutered (18 for the JOKER)
Distribute card's value movements between your inboard Pawns
